Interface netscape.application.ScrollBarOwner

public interface ScrollBarOwner
Interface implemented by objects interested in changes to a ScrollBar's state.

scrollBarDidBecomeActive(ScrollBar)
Called when the ScrollBar becomes active.
scrollBarDidBecomeInactive(ScrollBar)
Called when the ScrollBar becomes inactive.
scrollBarWasDisabled(ScrollBar)
Called when the ScrollBar becomes disabled.
scrollBarWasEnabled(ScrollBar)
Called when the ScrollBar becomes enabled.

scrollBarDidBecomeActive 
 public abstract void scrollBarDidBecomeActive(ScrollBar aScrollBar)
Called when the ScrollBar becomes active.

See Also:
setActive
scrollBarDidBecomeInactive 
 public abstract void scrollBarDidBecomeInactive(ScrollBar aScrollBar)
Called when the ScrollBar becomes inactive.

See Also:
setActive
scrollBarWasEnabled 
 public abstract void scrollBarWasEnabled(ScrollBar aScrollBar)
Called when the ScrollBar becomes enabled.

See Also:
setEnabled
scrollBarWasDisabled 
 public abstract void scrollBarWasDisabled(ScrollBar aScrollBar)
Called when the ScrollBar becomes disabled.

See Also:
setEnabled
